titles.title: Luxury Penthouse For Sale In Northshore Condominium Pattaya

descriptions.description: This stunning apartment occupies the complete 11th floor of the 5-star Northshore penthouse tower. A private gangway is leading to a very spacious unit 268 sqm with a large living room open kitchen 3 bedrooms 3 bathrooms quarters with lots of storage communal swimming pool fitness sauna and steam room facilities bay and beach views to the southeast &west daily sunset from your living room! The condo has been professionally designed and fitted throughout to very high specifications and full quality furnishing by Euro Design in Pattaya.

property.property-features: Maid Room,Dining Area,Fully Furnished,24h Manned Security,Sea View,Fitness,European Kitchen

Chic -bedroom apartments, with mountain view in Avenue project, on Surin Beach beach
ชิค อพาร์ตเมนต์2 1 ห้องนอน พร้อมวิว วิวภูเขา ในโครงการ 6 Avenue, บนชายหาด หาดสุรินทร์
pLocated between the two beaches Bangtao and Surin, it is an ideal base from which to explore Phuket Island. apartments of several types, modern design and functional layouts, including studio rooms, one-bedroom suites and two-bedroom suites. The apartments are well equipped and suitable even for long stays. The complex was built in accordance with all international standards only modern environmentally friendly materials were used in the construction. The apartments are well equipped and suitable even for long stays.ppbrppstrongInfrastructurestrongppThe condominium has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Rooftop pool, full-service fitness center. Wi-fi in the territory and in the apartments.ppbrppstrongWhats nearbystrongppThis stylish apartment complex is a -minute walk from Surin Beach. There are cafes, restaurants, mini markets, ATMs and everything you need for a comfortable stay nearby. Catch Beach Club. Shopping mall Surin Plaza.ppbrppstrongFor whom is it suitablestrongppThe apartments are relatively inexpensive, so they are well suited for young couples and groups of friends. You can save on car rental. Surin Beach is great for surfing.p
